A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like:
Note to Kathleen Kennedy:  This film is a disgrace. To turn something as precious and pure as Star Wars into a platform for your personal ideology and a middle finger to diehard fans is execrable. 

You've slandered a childhood hero of mine who least deserved it\, squandered the abundant narrative potential of TFA\, and turned me off to Star Wars forever. 

It isn't necessary to devalue and marginalize men in order to elevate women. Yet this film does so again and again\, along with purposely destroying a legitimate (male) hero\, Luke Skywalker. 

You and your cronies at LucasFilm make me embarrassed to be a woman. Disney and LucasFilm won't be getting another dime from my family as long as you're in residence there.
